fn.p: Author Contributions V.W.Y.L., W.W.L.C. and U.R.S. designed the study. V.W.Y.L. wrote the manuscript, and W.W.L.C. and U.R.S. contributed to the writing. V.W.Y.L. performed all of the analysis. W.W.L.C. contributed the outputs from the Dynamic Bioclimate Envelope Model (DBEM). G.R. prepared Fig. 1 and gave advice on the design of all other figures. All authors commented on the manuscript and analysis.
